name: XWUI Tree Select Component
description: Tree select dropdown component that combines Tree and Select functionality. Allows selection from hierarchical options in a dropdown. Supports checkable trees, expand all, icons, and various checked display strategies. Uses XWUITree and XWUIInput internally.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

treeCheckable.description: Whether tree nodes can be checked

treeDefaultExpandAll.description: Whether to expand all tree nodes by default

treeIcon.description: Whether to show icons in tree

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the tree select

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

value.description: Selected value (string, number, or array for multiple)
